metadata.title: CVE-2019-20169 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GPAC version 0.8.0 and0.9.0-development-20191109. There is a use-after-free in the functiontrak_Read() in isomedia/box_code_base.c.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
